thread.section_title: Adria Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great customer service
thread.title_full: Great customer service - Review of Adria Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jerry S
title: Great customer service
text:
My wife and I planned to stay for a few days as part of our move to UK. Circumstances kept changing and we had to extend our stay. Each time the staff did what they could to insure we were well taken care of. From helping us with luggage to great advice to help us with our move to London.
The rooms were spotless and well cared for every day. For the price you can't go wrong.
Very close to major transportation dining and shopping.
